structure.unit: DIVISION 2. CIVIL SERVICE FOR COUNTY EMPLOYEES

law.catch_line: Compliance by County personnel; furnishing data.

text.section:
Sec. 2-44. Compliance by County personnel; furnishing data.
All officers and employees of the County shall comply with and aid in all proper ways in carrying out the provisions of this division and the rules, regulations and orders thereunder. All officers and employees shall furnish any records or information which the Director or the Personnel Advisory Board may request for any purpose of this division.
